title: Full VGA Resolution Image Sensor for Pulsed Illumination Applications – The NanEye GS Sensor
text:
Request Quote Full VGA Resolution Image Sensor for Pulsed Illumination Applications – The NanEye GS Sensor 
The NanEye GS sensor is a compact package with a side length of just 3.4 mm. It is designed for use in ultra-compact lightweight vision applications of fast processes, and pulsed illumination applications. The device is directly mounted on the interface board. 
The synchronous electronic shutter, along with the frame rate of up to 100 images per second, offers blur free images at high speed. 
Key Features 
The NanEye GS has the following specifications: Full VGA resolution image sensor Global shutter Resolution: 0.41 MP - 620 (H) x 640 (V) 
Applications 
The NanEye GS finds application in the following areas: Medical
